content:
Cách làm cây thư mục Thuật ngữCây thư mục = dir tree = a hierarchical directory Trong R sử dụng package fs với function dir_tree. library('fs')dir_tree("D:/GITHUB/v3/content")## D:/GITHUB/v3/content## +-- cover.jpg## +-- ky-nang-r## | +-- dirtree.
Tạo website bằng Hugo Nội dungThiết lập nhanh Hugo với blogdown trong RStudioAlison Hill’s method
summary: Học cách sử dụng R vào công việc.
title: Kỹ năng R

content:
Thuật ngữCây thư mục = dir tree = a hierarchical directory
Trong R sử dụng package fs với function dir_tree.
library('fs')dir_tree("D:/GITHUB/v3/content")## D:/GITHUB/v3/content## +-- cover.jpg## +-- ky-nang-r## | +-- dirtree.html## | +-- dirtree.Rmd## | +-- dirtree.Rmd.lock~## | \-- _index.md## +-- post## | \-- 2020-12-01-r-rmarkdown## | +-- index.html## | +-- index.Rmd## | \-- index_files## | \-- figure-html## | \-- pie-1.png## \-- _index.mdTrong Visual Studio Code sử dụng extension file-tree-generator
summary:
Thuật ngữCây thư mục = dir tree = a hierarchical directory
Trong R sử dụng package fs với function dir_tree.
library('fs')dir_tree("D:/GITHUB/v3/content")## D:/GITHUB/v3/content## +-- cover.jpg## +-- ky-nang-r## | +-- dirtree.
title: Cách làm cây thư mục

content:
Bộ tài liệu Bergey’s Manual có các lần xuất bản như sau:1. Bergey’s Manual of Determinative BacteriologyFirst edition, 1923
Second edition, 1925
Third edition, 1930
Fourth edition, 1934
Fifth edition, 1939
Sixth edition, 1948. Bergey’s Manual of Determinative Bacteriology 6th edition. view
Seventh edition, 1957. Bergey’s Manual of Determinative Bacteriology 7th edition. view | light
Eighth edition, 1974. Bergey’s Manual of Determinative Bacteriology 8th edition. view
Ninth edition, 1994. Bergey’s Manual of Determinative Bacteriology 9th edition. view
2. Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 1st edKrieg, N.R. & Holt, J.G. (eds., 1984). Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 1st ed., vol. 1, Williams and Wilkins, Baltimore. view
Sneath, P.H.A., Mair, N.S., Sharpe, M.E. & Holt, J.G. (eds., 1986). Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 1st ed., vol. 2, Williams & Wilkins, Baltimore. view
Staley, J.T., Bryant, M.P., Pfennig, N. & Holt, J.G. (eds., 1989). Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 1st ed., vol. 3, Williams and Wilkins, Baltimore. view
Williams, S.T., Sharpe, M.E. & Holt, J.G. (eds., 1989). Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 1st ed., vol. 4, Williams and Wilkins, Baltimore. view
3. Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 2nd edGarrity, G.M., Boone, D.R. & Castenholz, R.W. (eds., 2001). Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 2nd ed., vol. 1, Springer-Verlag, New York, NY. light
Brenner, D.J., Krieg, N.R., Staley, J.T. & Garrity, G.M. (eds., 2005). Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 2nd ed., vol. 2, parts A, B and C, Springer-Verlag, New York, NY.
Part A: Introductory Essays. light
Part B: The Gammaproteobacteria. light
Part C: The Alpha-, Beta-, Delta-, and Epsilonproteobacteria. light
Vos, P., Garrity, G., Jones, D., Krieg, N.R., Ludwig, W., Rainey, F.A., Schleifer, K.-H. & Whitman, W.B. (eds., 2009). Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 2nd ed., vol. 3, Springer-Verlag, New York, NY. light
Krieg, N.R., Ludwig, W., Whitman, W.B., Hedlund, B.P., Paster, B.J., Staley, J.T., Ward, N. & Brown, D. (eds., 2010). Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 2nd ed., vol. 4, Springer-Verlag, New York, NY. light
Whitman, W.B., Goodfellow, M., Kämpfer, P., Busse, H.-J., Trujillo, M.E., Ludwig, W. & Suzuki, K.-i. (eds., 2012). Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, 2nd ed., vol. 5, parts A and B, Springer-Verlag, New York, NY. light
4. Bergey’s Manual of Systematics of Archaea and Bacteria (online version from 2015).Wiley version view
Hướng dẫn cách tải tài liệu video
5. Các tài liệu khácIdentification Flow Charts - Bergey’s Manual of Determinative Bacteriology,” n.d. light
Thông tin từ wikipedia
summary:
Bộ tài liệu Bergey’s Manual có các lần xuất bản như sau:1. Bergey’s Manual of Determinative BacteriologyFirst edition, 1923
Second edition, 1925
Third edition, 1930
Fourth edition, 1934
title: Bộ tài liệu về phân lập vi sinh vật Bergey's manual
